data.title: astromodels: Spatial and spectral models for astrophysics
data.name: astromodels
data.description: Spatial and spectral models for astrophysics

evidence: Owner is GitHub organization `threeML`, with multiple contributors badge: `![GitHub contributors](https://img.shields.io/github/contributors/threeML/astromodels)` suggesting community-style maintenance rather than a single lab or company.

"Astromodels is a very flexible framework to define models for likelihood or Bayesian analysis of astrophysical data." – a modeling framework intended to be used by other software, not just as a standalone app.

"Astromodels is not a modeling package, it only gives you the tools to build a model as complex as you need. You then need a separate package (such as 3ML) to fit that model to the data." – indicates it is a library/dependency used in research analysis workflows.
